body:
`README.md` hasn't been updated in a while.  This tightens up the text and mentions the Code of Conduct explicitly.

This also reduces the number of top-level files by moving `CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md` and `CONTRIBUTING.md` to the `.github` top-level directory.  `CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md` is linked in `README.md`, so people should still not miss it.  `CONTRIBUTING.md` is linked from every pull request (even if moved to `.github`).

- [x] Update `README.md` to be easier to skim
- [x] move `CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md` to `.github`
- [x] move `CONTRIBUTING.md` to `.github`
title: Update README.md, move CONTRIBUTING.md and CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md
